name: IDBRequest
description: The IDBRequest interface of the IndexedDB API provides access to results of asynchronous requests to databases and database objects using event handler attributes. Each reading and writing operation on a database is done using a request.

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'IDBRequest' in the 'Indexed Database API 2.0' specification.
